name: NonStandard Lines
desc:
* Lines.Make to create a Wire object.
* Wire objects can be shaped by methods.

name: NonStandard Scripting
desc:
* Adds .Stringify() method to objects, which uses C# reflection to output a JSON-like representation.
* Adds CodeConvert, which can TryParse JSON-like string representations into runtime C# objects.

name: NonStandard Unity Utilities
desc:
* Delayed: allows actions to execute on a timer, of frames or seconds
* Follow: makes one transform follow another
* LeavParent: automatically disconnect a transform from it's parent on start
* NextScene: change the scene on DoActivateTrigger
* OnActiveChange: execute functions when script is Enabled or Disabled

name: NonStandard System
desc:
* Proc, which can Delay functions and lambda expressions in a reflective way. This works in a Unity context, and is able to work in a pure C# context as well
* Show is an abstraction over logging, with callbacks that can filter strings to be logged.
* Global is a utility class that is intended to refrence a global dictionary of manager classes.
* EventBind is a Unity convenience class that exposes functions which can assign methods to UnityEvent<> lists.
* PlatformAdjust has callbacks to execute when a scene loads on different platforms
* ObjectPtr is a UnityEngine.Object reference that can navigate it's own internal structure as part of assignment in the UnityEditor.
* BuildTime places the build time of the project in a Resources folder, for reflective access at runtime.
* PerfWarnOnSelection write a warning if an object is selected in edit mode. This is useful to explain to users in Edit Mode why performance is lagging (because an actively updated object is selected).
* On2DEditorView performs callbacks when the user switches to 2D mode in the editor view.

name: NonStandard DataSheet
desc: Work-in-progress library to turn any List of objects into a spreadsheet

name: NonStandard Console
desc: This is a real re-invention of the wheel so to speak, a command-line console in Unity
